title: serif logo text
author: newsvend

comments.content:
It's a single typeface: **[FF Disturbance](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114902/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=FontShop&ffam=Disturbance%20-%20Regular&fid=23ae0fa938ba4aa68b5b82ceeac9ad21&fsize=60&text=BURKE%20NIAZI&fit=1)** by Jeremy Tankard (FontFont, 1993)  
Lower & Capital letters are the same for this font, so you can get this result by setting the text to "burke niazi", "BURKE NIAZI" or even "BuRkE nIaZi"
Thank you so much for solving this. Much appreciated!!
